title: [CLIENT] Loot BUG
body:
EUW:
When opening a chest, the screen froze, so I clicked home and then went back to loot, but no reward was given and both my key and chest were consumed.

replies.body: I pulled up your account and it doesn't look like you were able to open that chest yet. You should still have that chest and key, but hit me back up if you don't see it!
